tigr added to the channel by admin.

Hi all.

Following a talk with @hephaestus1115 I have summoned the relevant team to inquire regarding VPN topic to Kyrgizia.
1. As far as @dimanche , @gabriel and @tigr there are no VPN problems to Kyrgizia in the past weeks / months.
2. VPN to Kyrgizia was initially created for Narine and was intentionally not connected to our file servers.
3. upon talking to @tigr we have the following requests:
  a. Allow File server access while connected to the kyrgizie vpn
  b. Create a single access VPN for all locations
4. @tigr will provide a list of websites and the required IP location (kyrgizie websites with Kyrgizie IP, Hong Kong websites to Chinese IP etc.)
5. On top of our 24/7 vpn monitoring, @dimanche will provide manual inquiry (@dimanche please post daily status in this channel here) to all Krylatskaya personnel regarding VPN access to all involved employees to try and detect local issues if such issues exist.
6. I will update here once access to Samba server using Kyrgizie vpn is established

Victor, Leran, what is going on?
Can someone please come to our office and see what works good and what does not.
The whole day long we are failing to fulfill our payment obligations due to IT issues.
Shareholder is waiting for 2 payments and I'm not able to upload even 2 Swifts for him.
There is a network issue on the providers side. We are working on it
We need SEVERAL working VPN-s. It is a constant problem, please resolve urgently. 100m USD payments are still under risk today.
one of our ISPs had a network issue (10 minutes ago) we routed to a backup one now it should be fine
Then let's have SEVERAL networks and SEVERAL providers. We can not allow such troubles in operations since we now have a public obligation to provide a SWIFT at T+0.
I understand we do have multiple providers and networks and are adding more for high availability, as soon as the problem was detected (15m ago) we routed to a different provider
we have several! just making switch between them
we will also improve

Leran it is not 15 minutes. From day one since Sep we are facing such issues on a regular basis. From Monday this week I have no ground to do so. Now it is a legal obligation of our company to pay at T+0. So I will appreciate you very much to provide the proper IT infrastructure with all the back-up scenarios for the sake of continuity.

We are constantly working on improving - and if you had critical problems that deprived you from working - we were not aware of them.
the outage today was 15m I can show you the monitoring graphs

Leran, once more - you are aware and our IT guys are aware since September about awful work of VPN. No graphs I need, no explanations. It is not the first time I write to you about it. Please make it work constantly good, I have no doubts you can. Just nothing to discuss, since it should just work and fly.

@roman @dimanche @vic tomorrow at 16:00 please be available - we are fortifying the team and adding VPN , I would like to have a FULL status report of ALL communication and server access status for this meeting - please be ready.
